_header: Saint Luke in our gospel says us
Note: For other MSS see 4710; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 2639.
_description: Gospel for Eighth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luc in vre gospel seiþ vsÞat to his disciples seide
                    Jhesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu Crist vs spedeTo do penaunce and þider vs
                    lede. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Attendite a falsis prophetis qui veniunt (f.
                    201rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Luk in oure godspelle sais vsÞat to þe apostles
                    saide ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Til þat blisse grete god vs bryngeÞat at sale last
                    with outen endyng
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica viiia post festum trinitatis secundum lucam (p.
                    243)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sayne luke in oure gospell says vsþat tyll hys disciples sayd
                    ihesus…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu criste vs spedeTo do pennance and
                    þidere vs lede
CULGg531.Attributed Title: Þis es þe gospell of þe aghtend sonunday (f. 103)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint luc in ve gospel seiþ vsÞat to his disciples seid
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do peauynce & þider
                    vs lede. Amen
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title:
Attendite a falsis prophetis qui veniunt [end of last word coverd by
                    bar border] (f. 6rb)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt luke in oure gospell says vsþat tyll hys apostels sayde
                    ihesuskepe ȝow fra false prophetes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihesu cryste vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þider vs lede

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Luc in oure gospell sais vsÞat þe apostelys said to
                    ihesusKepe ȝow fro false profetys…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd crist ihesu vs spedeTo do penaws and þedyr
                    vs lede
